scripts.react-old: npm run clean && cp ./app/react/index.html ./www && babel --presets es2015,react --watch app/react/components --out-dir www/scripts
scripts.react: npm run clean && npm run setup-www && cp ./app/react/index.html ./www && npm run build-dev
scripts.angular2: npm run clean && npm run setup-www && cp ./app/angular2/index.html ./www && npm run webpack
scripts.build-dev: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -e app/react/browser/bootstrap.jsx -o www/scripts/bundle.dev.js --debug
scripts.build-tdd: browserify -e test/spec/suite.js -t [ rewireify --ignore test/**,node_modules/** ] -t reactify -o test/spec/bundle.js --debug
